name: databag
description: Databag is a federated, self-hosted messaging platform for private groups. It supports encrypted messaging, groups, video calls, and ActivityPub federation, all via a user-friendly web and mobile interface.
features: Federated Messaging: Connect with users across different servers. Decentralized communication.
End-to-End Encryption: Private conversations with strong encryption. Secure messaging.
Group Chats: Create private groups for team communication. Collaborate securely.
Video Calls: Built-in video conferencing capabilities. All-in-one platform.
ActivityPub Support: Integrate with the fediverse. Open protocol compatibility.
Self-Hosted: Own your messaging platform completely. No corporate surveillance.
